title: Schwartz and MacMahon
description:
Zach talks to ESPN's Michael Schwartz about the dominant Suns and Devin Booker's MVP case. Then ESPN's Tim MacMahon joins to talk MVP debates, the reeling Jazz, fake Rudy Gobert trades, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
